coded_answer.p: I am so happy to know that I have won first prize in your competition.
As you asked me to send you further information about three points, I am sending you my preferences as follows:
1. - I would prefer a longlog cabinslog cabin rather than a tentstent, because it is much more comfortable.
2. - I have chosen singing and painting as activities, because I love painting, moreover, I am very good at it, and singing because it is one of my talents.
3. - I would prefer to travel only in July because at the moment I am alone at home and I have to take care of my little sister.
I would like to know, what kind of clothes do I have to take with me and Howhow much money will I need as well?
Thanks in advance for youyour advice.
I am writing to you to tell you what an impressingimpressive experience I have had, helping at a pop concert.
I will start by telling you how crowded it was, the people waswere so excited that they were screaming from the beginning to the end. I couldn't even hear my own voice.

I cleared the stage before the concert, but you don'tcan't imagine howwhat it looked like after it?!!! full of flowers, T. shirtsT-shirts, hats, underwear, etc etc etc. I didn'tcouldn't feel my feet the next day, I was very tired.!! Anyway, I also laughed a lot, the music was fantastic, and the stars were really nice to every oneeveryone.
I tried to take a photo of everyone, but sometimes it was not possible. I will send you a copy of the best pictures the next time.
